sections.title: Company Overview & Catalog Introduction
sections.content: ProVia has been a trusted name in high‑performance doors for over three decades, blending timeless craftsmanship with cutting‑edge technology. Our brand values—quality, innovation, and sustainability—guide every door we design, ensuring each product delivers lasting durability and exceptional aesthetic appeal. This catalog serves as your roadmap to the full range of ProVia door solutions, from the sleek ProVia Signature Series to the robust ProVia SecureLine, helping you select the perfect fit for any project. By providing clear specifications, performance data, and design inspiration, we make it easy for architects, builders, and homeowners to make informed decisions that enhance both safety and style.
key_takeaways: ProVia combines craftsmanship with modern technology to deliver durable, stylish doors.
The catalog offers detailed specifications and design guidance for all ProVia door families.

sections.title: Key Features & Benefits of ProVia Doors
sections.content: ProVia doors are engineered for lasting durability, with premium hardwood cores and reinforced steel frames that stand up to daily wear and harsh weather. Their advanced thermal‑break technology and high‑performance insulation help reduce heating and cooling costs, delivering up to 30% energy savings compared with standard doors. Security is built in, featuring multi‑point locking systems and impact‑resistant glazing that meet or exceed industry safety standards. A wide range of customizable finishes, glass options, and contemporary designs ensure each door enhances the aesthetic appeal of any home, while maintaining the brand’s signature quality. Whether you choose the Classic Solid Core or the Modern Glass Panel collection, ProVia doors combine style, strength, and efficiency for a smarter, more comfortable living space.
key_takeaways: Exceptional durability with hardwood cores and reinforced steel frames.
Energy‑efficient design reduces utility costs and improves comfort.
Robust security features and customizable aesthetics for any home style.

sections.title: Innovative Technologies & Construction
sections.content: ProVia’s construction approach blends time‑tested craftsmanship with cutting‑edge engineering to deliver homes that are both beautiful and built to last. Our structural frames are engineered from high‑strength steel, providing superior rigidity while resisting warping and corrosion, and are complemented by premium wood‑grain and fiberglass panels that deliver the look of natural wood with far greater durability and low maintenance. The proprietary FrameSaver system reinforces critical load points and seals joints, dramatically reducing thermal bridging and improving energy efficiency. Meanwhile, PermaTech’s advanced moisture‑control membrane protects the envelope from water intrusion, extending the life of the building envelope and preserving indoor air quality. Together, these technologies create a resilient, high‑performance home that stands up to the toughest climate challenges while offering homeowners peace of mind.
key_takeaways: Steel framing and advanced composites provide unmatched strength, stability, and low‑maintenance aesthetics.
Proprietary FrameSaver and PermaTech technologies enhance energy efficiency, moisture protection, and overall durability.

sections.title: Glass Options & Energy Efficiency
sections.content: Choosing the right glass can transform a space while keeping energy costs low. Our clear glass offers unobstructed views and maximizes natural daylight, perfect for bright, open interiors. For areas where privacy is essential, the privacy glass provides a subtle frosted finish without sacrificing light transmission. The waterfall glass adds a sleek, reflective surface that enhances modern aesthetics and reduces glare. All three options are engineered with high‑performance coatings, delivering low U‑Factor values for superior insulation and low Solar Heat Gain Coefficient (SHGC) ratings to keep interiors comfortable year‑round.
key_takeaways: Clear, privacy, and waterfall glass each meet distinct design and privacy needs.
All glass selections feature low U‑Factor and SHGC ratings for optimal energy efficiency.

sections.title: Design Options & Customization
sections.content: Our design portfolio offers an extensive palette of finishes and colors, allowing you to match any interior style—from sleek matte blacks to warm natural wood tones. Choose from a variety of hardware styles, including brushed nickel, antique brass, and modern matte black, each engineered for smooth operation and lasting durability. Frame claddings are available in lightweight aluminum, robust steel, and eco‑friendly composite options, giving you the flexibility to prioritize strength, sustainability, or aesthetic appeal. With the Signature Series, you can mix and match finishes and hardware to create a truly personalized look that enhances both function and visual impact. All customization choices are supported by our easy‑install system, so you can upgrade your space without hassle.
key_takeaways: A wide range of finishes, colors, and hardware styles lets you tailor the look to your exact taste.
Multiple frame cladding options provide choices for durability, sustainability, and design aesthetics.

sections.title: Warranty & Service Commitment
sections.content: ProVia stands behind every product with a comprehensive warranty that gives you peace of mind and confidence in your investment. Our industry‑leading 10‑year limited warranty on ProVia UltraSeal waterproofing systems covers material defects and workmanship, ensuring that your project stays protected against leaks and wear. For the ProVia ProGuard exterior cladding, we provide a 7‑year warranty that includes free repairs for any premature fading or cracking, so your building continues to look its best. In addition to the warranty, our dedicated service team is available 24/7 to answer questions, schedule on‑site inspections, and coordinate any necessary support, making the resolution process fast and hassle‑free. Access our online warranty portal anytime to view coverage details, submit claims, and track the status of your service requests.
key_takeaways: ProVia offers a 10‑year limited warranty on UltraSeal waterproofing and a 7‑year warranty on ProGuard cladding.
24/7 service support and an easy‑to‑use online portal ensure quick, hassle‑free assistance.

sections.title: Sustainability & Eco‑Friendly Practices
sections.content: ProVia is committed to protecting the planet while delivering beautiful, high‑performance homes. Our EcoSeries kitchen cabinets are crafted from responsibly sourced wood and finished with low‑VOC, water‑based stains, reducing indoor air pollutants and waste. All of our manufacturing facilities operate under ENERGY STAR certification, meaning we use up to 30% less energy than conventional factories and pass those savings on to you through lower utility bills. We continuously invest in renewable energy, waste‑reduction programs, and closed‑loop recycling to minimize our carbon footprint. By choosing ProVia, you enjoy premium design and the confidence that your home is built with environmentally responsible practices.
key_takeaways: EcoSeries products use responsibly sourced materials and low‑VOC finishes for healthier indoor air.
ENERGY STAR‑certified manufacturing reduces energy consumption and lowers your utility costs.
ProVia’s sustainable processes, including renewable energy and recycling, lower the overall carbon footprint of each home.

sections.title: Contact Information & Next Steps
sections.content: Thank you for taking the time to explore our solutions – we’re excited to help you bring them to life. For any questions or to start the ordering process, reach out to our sales team at sales@yourcompany.com or call 1‑800‑555‑1234; you can also visit our website to submit a quick contact form. The ordering journey is simple: request a personalized quote, review the proposal with our experts, and place your order securely through our online portal. Whether you’re interested in the EcoFlow Pro Battery for reliable power or the SmartGuard Security System for peace of mind, our team will guide you to the right configuration and highlight the key benefits. Ready to move forward? Schedule a live demo today or contact us now to get started.
key_takeaways: Easy contact options and a clear, three‑step ordering process.
Personalized support to match you with the right product, such as EcoFlow Pro Battery or SmartGuard Security System.

sections.title: Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door – 36" x 80" – Style 002‑440 – Rustic Bronze Finish
sections.content: Upgrade your home’s entryway with ProVia’s Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Door, finished in a rich Rustic Bronze that looks striking from both the outside and inside. This 36" × 80" right‑hand inswing door features high‑definition embossing on a smooth steel panel, paired with a satin‑nickel Hoppe Dallas lever set at a 1 ¾" backset for a sleek, secure look. The door is housed in a textured Rustic Bronze aluminum frame with a security plate and a Bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold, ensuring durability and a tight seal. Certified Energy Star in all 50 states, it delivers an impressive U‑Factor of 0.17 and a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.01, helping you save on heating and cooling costs. Priced at $2,903.73 plus $625.00 for professional installation, the total investment of $3,528.73 brings premium performance and curb‑appeal together in one package.

selected_images.reason: Shows the Rustic Bronze finish and decorative embossing on both the exterior and interior of the door, helping customers visualize the product’s appearance.
Provides the precise door dimensions and frame depth, essential for planning the rough opening and ensuring a proper fit.
Displays the Energy Star certification and performance metrics (U‑Factor, SHGC), reinforcing the door’s energy‑efficiency benefits.

key_takeaways: 36" × 80" right‑hand inswing door with Rustic Bronze finish and high‑definition embossing.
Satin‑nickel Hoppe Dallas lever hardware with 1 ¾" backset for secure, stylish operation.
Energy Star certified with U‑Factor 0.17 and SHGC 0.01 for superior energy savings.
Total installed price: $3,528.73, including professional labor.

sections.title: Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door – 36" x 84" – Style 110 – Clear Glass – Textured Eggshell Aluminum Frame
sections.content: The ProVia Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door in Style 110 offers a sleek, modern look with a clear glass panel that welcomes natural light. Sized at a nominal 36" × 84" (actual 37 9/16" × 85 11/16") and configured as a right‑hand inswing, it fits standard openings while providing a comfortable entry. The door is set in a textured eggshell aluminum frame with a bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold, and it comes equipped with a black Hoppe Dallas lever set (1 3/4" backset) and matching key‑order alike hardware. With a U‑Factor of 0.24, SHGC of 0.10, and air infiltration ≤ 0.04 cfm/ft², the door helps keep your home energy‑efficient and comfortable year‑round. The complete package is priced at $3,273.99 plus $625.00 for labor, for a total of $3,898.99, delivering premium quality at a transparent cost.

selected_images.reason: Shows the exterior and interior appearance of the door, highlighting the clear glass panel and overall design.
Provides precise dimensional specifications for the door, useful for planning installation.
Displays the energy performance ratings (U‑Factor, SHGC, air infiltration) that demonstrate the door’s efficiency.

key_takeaways: 20‑gauge smooth steel construction with clear glass delivers durability and natural light.
Textured eggshell aluminum frame with bronze ZAC threshold ensures weather resistance and a refined look.
High energy performance (U‑Factor 0.24, SHGC 0.10, air infiltration ≤ 0.04 cfm/ft²) helps reduce heating and cooling costs.
All‑in‑one price: $3,273.99 product + $625 labor = $3,898.99, including premium black Hoppe Dallas lever hardware.

sections.title: Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door – 36" x 84" – Style 437 – Vallis Red – Privacy Glass
sections.content: The Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door combines striking Vallis Red finish with a sleek, high‑definition embossing that makes a bold first impression both inside and out. Its ComforTech DC obscure privacy glass lets natural light filter through while keeping your home private, and the black‑finished Plymouth Grip entrance handle, Georgian interior handle, and thumb‑turn deadbolt provide a coordinated, secure look. Engineered for performance, the door delivers an impressive U‑Factor of 0.30 and a low Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.19, helping you maintain comfortable indoor temperatures and lower energy bills. With air infiltration rated at ≤ 0.04 cfm/ft², you get tight weather‑tight sealing, and the included bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold and security plate add extra durability and protection.

key_takeaways: Vallis Red finish with textured aluminum cladding delivers vibrant curb appeal.
Obscure privacy glass lets light in while protecting your privacy.
Black hardware set offers a cohesive, modern look with enhanced security.
Energy‑efficient performance: U‑Factor 0.30, SHGC 0.19, air infiltration ≤ 0.04 cfm/ft².

sections.title: Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door – 36" x 84" – Style 350 – Pistachio – Clear Glass
sections.content: Introducing the ProVia Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door in a fresh pistachio finish, sized at a generous 36" × 84" for a grand entrance. This Style 350 door features a sleek oval clear‑glass panel framed by a decorative grid on the exterior, letting natural light flood your entryway while maintaining privacy. All‑black hardware—including a Plymouth Grip entrance handle, Georgian interior handle, and thumb‑turn deadbolt—adds a modern, cohesive look. Engineered for efficiency, the door delivers an impressive U‑Factor of 0.30, a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.19, and air infiltration of ≤ 0.04 cfm/ft², helping you keep energy costs low. The right‑hand inswing configuration and bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold ensure smooth operation and a secure seal.

key_takeaways: Pistachio interior and exterior finish with textured Sandpiper Beige aluminum frame cladding.
Clear oval glass panel with decorative exterior grid and all‑black hardware for a modern look.
Energy‑efficient performance: U‑Factor 0.30, SHGC 0.19, air infiltration ≤ 0.04 cfm/ft².
Right‑hand inswing, bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold, and black ball‑bearing hinges for smooth, secure operation.

sections.title: Legacy 20‑Gauge Woodgrain Textured Steel Entry Door – 36" x 84" – Style 350 – Dark Mahogany – Privacy Glass
sections.content: Introducing ProVia’s Legacy 20‑Gauge Woodgrain Textured Steel Entry Door in a sleek Dark Mahogany finish. This 36" × 84" single entry door features a stylish 350‑style woodgrain‑textured steel panel paired with ComforTech DLA‑UV obscure privacy glass, delivering both curb‑appeal and privacy. Black‑finished Plymouth Grip entrance handle, Georgian interior handle, and a thumb‑turn deadbolt provide secure, elegant hardware that complements the rich mahogany. The FrameSaver frame with textured Tudor‑Brown aluminum cladding and a bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold ensures a tight, energy‑efficient seal, backed by a U‑Factor of 0.24 and SHGC of 0.07. Ready for right‑hand inswing installation, this door combines durability, low‑maintenance steel construction with the warm look of wood grain.

key_takeaways: Rich Dark Mahogany woodgrain texture on durable 20‑gauge steel with an elegant privacy glass insert.
High energy performance (U‑Factor 0.24, SHGC 0.07) and secure black hardware for lasting comfort and safety.

sections.title: Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door – 36" x 84" – Style 240 – Pistachio – Privacy Glass
sections.content: Introducing the ProVia Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door in a fresh pistachio finish, featuring a sleek 2‑panel Style 240 design with ComforTech DC obscure privacy glass for added seclusion without sacrificing natural light. The door is a right‑hand inswing, inside‑looking‑out, and comes equipped with all‑black hardware—including a Plymouth Grip entrance handle and a Georgian interior handle—for a modern, cohesive look. Its textured Sandpiper Beige aluminum frame cladding pairs perfectly with the pistachio‑colored steel, while the bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold and black ball‑bearing hinges ensure smooth, secure operation. Energy performance is outstanding, with a U‑Factor of 0.30, a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.19, and air infiltration of ≤0.04 cfm/ft², helping you keep heating and cooling costs low. Priced at $4,596.33 plus $625.00 for professional installation, this door delivers premium aesthetics, durability, and efficiency in one package.

sections.title: Legacy 20‑Gauge Woodgrain Textured Steel Entry Door – 36" x 84" – Style 006 – Dark Mahogany – Bright Brass Hardware
sections.content: Introducing the ProVia Legacy 20‑Gauge Woodgrain Textured Steel Entry Door in a rich Dark Mahogany finish, perfectly sized at 36" × 84" for a grand entrance. This 6‑panel door combines the timeless look of woodgrain with the durability of steel, and it’s paired with lifetime bright brass hardware—including a Plymouth Grip entrance handle and a Georgian interior handle—for a touch of elegance that lasts a lifetime. The door comes in a FrameSaver frame with a Tudor‑brown aluminum exterior and a matching dark mahogany interior frame, ensuring a seamless, high‑quality appearance inside and out. Certified Energy Star across all 50 states, it delivers an impressive U‑Factor of 0.17 and a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.01, helping you keep your home comfortable while reducing energy costs. Installation is made easy with the included bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold and zinc‑chromate ball‑bearing hinges, and the total package is priced at $4,147.18, covering both product and labor.

Paired with a textured Tudor Brown aluminum frame and a bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold, it provides a seamless, secure, and stylish entry for any modern home.

sections.title: Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door – 36" x 84" – Style 006 – Rustic Bronze – Satin Nickel Hardware
sections.content: Upgrade your home’s curb appeal with the Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door, a 36" × 84" masterpiece finished in a rich Rustic Bronze that adds timeless character. The door’s PermaTech composite frame and textured aluminum cladding deliver exceptional durability while the satin‑nickel Camelot Grip handle and thumb‑turn deadbolt provide a sleek, secure feel. Certified ENERGY STAR in all 50 states, it boasts a low U‑Factor of 0.12 and a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.01, helping you keep heating and cooling costs down. With an air infiltration rate of ≤ 0.03 cfm/ft², this right‑hand inswing door ensures a tight, comfortable seal against the elements.

sections.title: Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door – 36" x 80" – Style 112 – Waterfall Privacy Glass
sections.content: Introducing the Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door, a 36" × 80" right‑hand inswing that blends timeless style with modern performance. The door features a PermaTech composite frame finished in textured rustic bronze, paired with elegant antique‑brass Camelot Grip hardware and a thumb‑turn deadbolt for secure, effortless entry. Its ComforTech DC Waterfall Privacy Glass not only adds a sophisticated, frosted look but also helps maintain privacy while letting natural light filter through. With an industry‑leading U‑Factor of 0.24 and a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.19, this door delivers superior energy efficiency, keeping your home comfortable year‑round. Built to last, the fiberglass construction resists warping, cracking, and moisture, ensuring lasting curb appeal and peace of mind.

sections.title: Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door – 36" x 80" – Style 006 – Rustic Bronze – Antique Brass Hardware
sections.content: Introducing the Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door, a 36" × 80" masterpiece that blends timeless style with modern performance. Finished in a rich Rustic Bronze on both sides, the door showcases a striking Camelot Grip entrance handle in Antique Brass, adding a touch of classic elegance to any home. Built on a PermaTech composite frame with a 4 9/16" depth and 2" brickmold, it offers superior durability and low maintenance while delivering an ENERGY STAR rating in all 50 states. With an impressive U‑Factor of 0.12 and a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.01, this right‑hand inswing door helps keep your interior comfortable and your energy bills low. Experience the perfect balance of beauty, strength, and efficiency with this ready‑to‑install entry solution.

selected_images.reason: Shows both exterior and interior views of the door, highlighting the Rustic Bronze finish and Antique Brass hardware.

key_takeaways: ENERGY STAR certified with a low U‑Factor (0.12) and SHGC (0.01) for superior energy efficiency
Durable PermaTech composite frame with 4 9/16" depth and 2" brickmold for strength and low maintenance

sections.title: Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door – 36" x 80" – Clear Glass – Mountain Berry Red – Antique Brass Hardware
sections.content: Introducing the ProVia Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door, a 36" × 80" single‑entry door built with a durable PermaTech composite frame and finished in a vibrant Mountain Berry Red that looks stunning inside and out. The right‑hand inswing configuration features a clear ComforTech DLA‑UV glass panel, allowing natural light to flood your entryway while providing UV protection. All hardware is crafted in an elegant antique brass finish, highlighted by the Camelot Grip entrance handle for a timeless, upscale look. ENERGY STAR certified across all 50 states, this door delivers an impressive U‑Factor of 0.19 and a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.07, helping you keep your home comfortable and energy‑efficient year‑round.

sections.title: Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door – 36" x 80" – Style 003 – High‑Definition Embossing
sections.content: The Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door in Style 003 delivers a sleek, snow‑mist white façade with high‑definition embossing that adds depth and visual interest to both the exterior and interior. Constructed from robust 20‑gauge steel, the door provides superior security and long‑lasting durability while the textured aluminum frame with a bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold ensures a tight, weather‑tight seal. Certified Energy Star in all 50 states, it boasts an impressive U‑Factor of 0.17 and a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of just 0.01, helping keep your home comfortable and reducing utility costs. The black Hoppe Dallas lever hardware offers a modern touch, and the right‑hand inswing design opens inward for easy access. With a total installed price of $3,528.73, this door combines premium aesthetics, performance, and value for any new construction or remodel.

sections.content: The ProVia Legacy 20‑Gauge Smooth Steel Entry Door in a rich Evergreen finish delivers a seamless, modern look that shines from both the outside and inside of your home. It’s equipped with a satin‑nickel Hoppe Dallas lever (1 ¾‑inch backset) and matching key‑order‑alike hardware, giving you a cohesive, premium appearance. Energy Star certified in all 50 states, the door boasts an impressive U‑Factor of 0.17, a Solar Heat Gain Coefficient of 0.01, and air infiltration of ≤0.04 cfm/ft², helping you lower heating and cooling costs. The textured Evergreen aluminum frame and bronze ZAC auto‑adjusting threshold provide durability and a tight weather seal, while the right‑hand inswing configuration fits a standard 36" × 80" opening. sections.title: Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door – 36" x 80" – Clear Glass – Style 440
sections.content: Introducing the Heritage Smooth Fiberglass Entry Door, a 36" × 80" single‑entry door that blends timeless style with modern performance. The 1‑panel 440 style features a clear glass insert framed by a PermaTech composite core and a textured Café‑Cream aluminum exterior, delivering a sleek look while protecting against the elements. Finished in antique‑brass hardware, the door includes a Camelot Grip entrance handle and a thumb‑turn deadbolt for secure, easy access. With an ENERGY STAR rating in all 50 states, its U‑Factor of 0.20 and SHGC of 0.09 keep your home comfortable and energy‑efficient year‑round. Priced at $4,468.84 plus $625.00 for professional installation, the total investment is $5,093.84 for a door that adds curb appeal, durability, and savings on utility bills.
